遼史.definition: History of the Liao Dynasty, twenty first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed under Toktoghan 脫脫|脱脱[Tuo1 tuo1] in 1345 during the Yuan Dynasty 元[Yuan2], 116 scrolls

遼寧.definition: see 遼寧省|辽宁省[Liao2ning2 Sheng3]

遼寧古盜鳥.definition: Archaeoraptor liaoningensis (bird-like dinosaur found in Liaoning province)

遼寧省.definition: Liaoning Province, capital Shenyang 瀋陽市|沈阳市[Shen3yang2 Shi4] (abbr. to 遼|辽[Liao2])

遼寧號.definition: Liaoning, the first aircraft carrier commissioned into the PLA Navy (commissioned in 2012)

遼東.definition: Liaodong peninsula between Bohai 渤海 and Yellow sea; east and south of Liaoning province; east of Liao river 遼河|辽河

遼河.definition: Liao River of northeast China, passing through Inner Mongolia, Hebei, Jilin and Liaoning

遼海.definition: east and south of Liaoning province

遼源.definition: see 遼源市|辽源市[Liao2yuan2 Shi4]

遼源市.definition: Liaoyuan, prefecture-level city in Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2lin2 Sheng3]

遼瀋戰役.definition: Liaoshen Campaign (Sep-Nov 1948), the first of the three major campaigns by the People's Liberation Army near the end of the Chinese Civil War

遼金.definition: Liao and Jin dynasties, namely: Liao or Khitan dynasty (907-1125) and Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)

遼陽.definition: see 遼陽市|辽阳市[Liao2yang2 Shi4]

遼陽市.definition: Liaoyang, prefecture-level city in Liaoning Province 遼寧省|辽宁省[Liao2ning2 Sheng3]

遼陽縣.definition: Liaoyang county in Liaoyang 遼陽|辽阳[Liao2 yang2], Liaoning
